name: a game about worms in space
name_original: a game about worms in space
description:
grab your friend and become enemies in the neverending battle between red and blue space worms (or centipedes with no legs or caterpillars) IN SPACE!

fight by spitting parts of your own body!
grow new parts by eating space rocks! 
get 11 parts to charge up the DEVASTATING SUPERBEAM* and unleash it upon the enemy! 

controls:
blue worm: ESDF move, TAB shoot, Q eat rocks when near
red worm: ARROW KEYS move, N shoot, M eat rocks. or maybe it's the other way around

* its sound is so great the pico-8 can't handle it

made in a week for the egx 2018 game jam, so yeah.
